properties.value:
<script>
    $(document).ready(function(){
        //Atualizar valor do hidden field do envio_processo
        $('input[id*=atualizar_envio_processo]').val("#form.detalhe_processo.envio_processo[{form.processos.detalhe_processo}]#");
    });
    
    $(window).load(function(){
         var flag_validacao = '#variable.flag_validacao#';
         
        if(flag_validacao === '1' || flag_validacao.startsWith("#variable.flag_validacao")){
            $("form#processo :input").change(function(){
                $("input#flag_alteracoes").attr("value","SIM");    
            });
        }
    });
    
    $(window).ready(function(){
        $("#processo").submit(function(){
            $('input[id*=email]').each(function() {
                $(this).val($(this).val().trim());
            });
        });
    });
    
</script>

properties.extraCondition: e.customProperties.nivel_1 IN (select distinct vb.customProperties.nivel_1 from app_fd_list_values_bcp vb)
e.customProperties.nivel_3 IN (select distinct vb.customProperties.nivel_3 from app_fd_list_values_bcp vb)
e.customProperties.nivel_1 IN (select distinct vb.customProperties.nivel_1 from app_fd_list_values_mtg vb)
e.customProperties.nivel_1 IN (select distinct vb.customProperties.nivel_1 from app_fd_list_values_bic vb)
e.customProperties.nivel_1 IN (select distinct vb.customProperties.nivel_1 from app_fd_list_values_nvb vb)
